AssortedDebugSettings.name: debug.breakheld
AssortedDebugSettings.description: Breaks the current item in your hands.

AssortedDebugSettings.name: debug.debugcamera
AssortedDebugSettings.description: Activates a free camera with various controls for movement, rotation, zoom, and camera speed adjustment.

AssortedDebugSettings.name: debug.disablecondition
AssortedDebugSettings.description: Toggles degradation of tools and weapons based on usage.

AssortedDebugSettings.name: debug.noclip
AssortedDebugSettings.description: Toggles NoClip mode, allowing players to fly and pass through objects.

AssortedDebugSettings.name: debug.puzzlereset
AssortedDebugSettings.description: Resets all keycard puzzles in monuments, including loot.
